p:
The surface tension of each sample was measured using a SFZL-A1 surface tensiometer using the platinum plate method
34, 35 . The contact angle of each sample on cotton leaves was measured using a JC2000D contact angle meter
36, 37 . The viscosity of the ultra-low-volume sprays was measured using a NDJ-5S rotary viscometer. The reference product was 540 g/L thidiazuron·diuron suspension concentrate, which was recorded as 6. One gram of the reference product was diluted to 540 mL with water for subsequent experiments.
